Text: Following the Great Financial Crisis, central banks worldwide initiated Friedman's policy of helicopter money, dispensing trillions of dollars.
Effect: central banks worldwide initiated Friedman's policy of helicopter money, dispensing trillions of dollars.
Sentence: <e1>Following the Great Financial Crisis</e1>, <e2>central banks worldwide initiated Friedman's policy of helicopter money, dispensing trillions of dollars.</e2>
